entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 10:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
